item.title: [Optional] R Basics 1
item.description: Welcome Welcome to to the course! This is the first of 2 sets of exercises introducing you to R, if you are not that familiar with it, or you would like to practice R basics before getting started. Getting Started with R and RStudio To complete the exercises in this course, you will need to access RStudio. You can do this in the cloud on the courseâ€™s RStudio cloud site:

item.title: Introduction to Data Retreval
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
